thread.title: NIT Delhi JEE Main Cutoff 2024 - Opening and Closing Ranks
thread.title_full: NIT Delhi JEE Main Cutoff 2024 - Opening and Closing Ranks

author: bschool.careers360.com
title: NIT Delhi JEE Main Cutoff 2024 - Opening and Closing Ranks
text:
NIT Delhi JEE Main Cutoff 2025 - JoSAA will release the NIT Delhi JEE Main cutoff percentile on the official website, josaa.nic.in. Candidates can check the JEE Mains 2025 cutoff for NIT Delhi to know the opening and closing ranks for admissions. To be eligible for admission to NIT Delhi , students must qualify the JEE Main exam and secure a rank higher than the closing rank. The cutoff of JEE Main for NIT Delhi varies by course and category. The NIT cutoff percentile will be updated after each round of JoSAA counselling .
New: Direct link to apply for JEE Main 2025 registration for session 1
Also Check: Crack JEE Main 2025 - Join Our Free Crash Course Now!
JEE Main 2025: Sample Papers | Syllabus | Mock Tests | PYQs | Video Lectures
JEE Main 2025: Preparation Guide | High Scoring Topics | Study Plan 100 Days
NIT Delhi JEE Main Cutoff 2024 - Opening and Closing Ranks The authorities prepare the NIT Delhi JEE Main cutoff keeping in mind various factors like past cutoff trends, difficulty level of JEE Main, number of applicants, and more. NIT Delhi cut off acts as a screening process for counselling and seat allotment to offer admission to candidates. Moreover, the NIT Delhi cutoff marks differ as per the state quota of the applicant. Read the article to know the detailed information about NIT Delhi JEE Main cutoff 2025.
Also Check: JEE Mains Cutoff I JEE Main College Predictor I JEE Main Rank Predictor
Previous Years’ JEE Main Cutoff for NIT Delhi Check previous years’ NIT Delhi cutoff for the home state and other states from the tables given below to know the probable JEE Main cutoff for NIT Delhi for the present session.
NIT Delhi JEE Main Cutoff 2025 Candidates can check the NIT Delhi cutoff for open category gender neutral below.

Factors Determining NIT Delhi JEE Main Cutoff 2025
The following factors will be considered while preparing the NIT Delhi JEE Main 2025 cutoff
Number of applicants
Performance in the entrance exam
Difficulty level of the JEE Main 2025
Cutoff trends of the previous years’ exam
Courses offered at NIT Delhi The following courses are offered at NIT Delhi.
UPES B.Tech Admissions 2025 Ranked #42 among Engineering colleges in India by NIRF | Highest CTC 50 LPA , 100% Placements
Apply Amrita University B.Tech 2025 Recognized as Institute of Eminence by Govt. of India | NAAC ‘A++’ Grade | Upto 75% Scholarships

Download EBook Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. What is the JEE Main cutoff for NIT Delhi for Computer Science and Engineering for General category candidates? JEE Main cutoff for Computer Science and Engineering for admission in NIT Delhi i.e. closing rank for General candidates as of 2024 was-
Home state male- 10950
Other state male- 7256
Home state female- 16763
Other state female- 13076
2. What is the Electrical and Electronics Engineering JEE Main cutoff for NIT Delhi for General category candidates? Electrical and Electronics Engineering JEE Main cutoff for NIT Delhi i.e. closing ranks for General category candidates for 2023 was-
Home state male- 12370
Other state male- 12777
Home state female- 18771
Other state female- 18450
